<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Camera Control

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets the orientation of the given camera in the direction of the given vector. Needs [[camCommit]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> camera '''camSetDir''' direction

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> camera: [[Object]] - object of type "camera"

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> direction: [[Array]] in format [x,y,z] - direction of camera. Must be a valid vector.

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>pos1 = [[player]] [[modelToWorld]] [0,5,5];
cam = "camera" [[camCreate]] pos1;
cam [[cameraEffect]] ["INTERNAL", "BACK"];
pos2 = [[player]] [[modelToWorld]] [0,50,50];
cam [[camSetPos]] pos2; 
cam [[camSetDir]] (pos2 [[vectorFromTo]] pos1);
cam [[camCommit]] 5;
0 = [] [[spawn]] 
{
	[[waitUntil]] {[[camCommitted]] cam};
	cam [[camSetPos]] pos1; 
	cam [[camCommit]] 5;
};</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[direction]], [[setDir]], [[camSetTarget]]
</value></part></template>
